setShakeAll

public void setShakeAll(int strength,
                        int speed,
                        int fallOfSpeed)
Shake all surfaces with max Z-displacement strength, vibration-speed speed, and shake decline fallOfSpeed. (min 0, max 1000 (1000 = un-ending shaking))

Parameters:
strength -
speed -
fallOfSpeed -
